name: Omni-Contraction Training (multi-tempo)
time_per_session_breakdown: 3 sets x 8-12 reps, each with a distinct tempo emphasis
overview_and_execution: 1st set: normal tempo (~2-0-1). 2nd set: slow negative (~4-1-1). 3rd set: explosive concentric (~2-0-X). All around 8-12 reps at moderate load, resting ~60-90s between sets.
example_application: Biceps curl: Set1 normal 8 reps, Set2 4s negative 8 reps, Set3 explosive up 8 reps. Increase weight if easy.
important_notes: Aims to hit muscle from multiple contraction speeds. Great variation for short hypertrophy blocks.
